Class VKHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.client.HttpClient

    public class VKHttpClient
extends org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient
    Class provides configured http client for API request loading
